document_data.name: the Bronze Phalanx
document_data.mainbody: The '''Bronze Phalanx''', also called the '''Nutcrackers''', was part of the standing army of the [[efreet]] in the [[City of Brass]] on the [[Elemental Plane of Fire]].
document_data.Organization: The 1,200 [[azer]] of the Bronze Phalanx were the siege engineers for the [[Marrake al-Sidan al-Hariq ben Lazan|Sultan's]] army.
document_data.Activities: The Sultan of the efreet usually deployed the Bronze Phalanx against the [[djinn]] or rebellious [[noble efreeti]].
document_data.Base of Operations: The City of Brass served as the base of the Bronze Phalanx.
